text: Ernesto Fajardo (6 November 1933 â€“ 18 January 2022), better known by his stage name Don Pepot, or simply Pepot, was a Filipino comedian, actor, radio host and writer.Don Pepot, people.theiapolis.com He was born in Malabon, Rizal, Philippine Islands. His career began in 1964. He was known for his roles in Hee-Man: Master of None, My Bugoy Goes to Congress and Enteng the Dragon. Pepot died on 18 January 2022 in Valenzuela, Philippines from pneumonia caused by COVID-19, aged 88. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the Philippines Category:Filipino movie actors Category:Filipino television actors Category:Writers from Manila Category:Filipino comedians Category:Actors from Rizal
title: Don Pepot
